meanings.definition: The process of cooling a liquid below its boiling point.
meanings.sent1: Subcooling helps in preventing the liquid from boiling.
meanings.sent2: The subcooling of the liquid was necessary to reach the desired temperature.
meanings.sent3: The liquid enjoyed a refreshing subcooling session below its boiling point.
meanings.sent4: The subcooling of the liquid was like putting it in a freezer before heating it up.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the subcooling of the liquid as it slowly dropped in temperature.

meanings.definition: The state of being cooled below a certain temperature.
meanings.sent1: The subcooling of the liquid made it pleasantly cold.
meanings.sent2: After subcooling, the liquid was ready to be used in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The subcooling of the liquid turned it into a chilly treat.
meanings.sent4: The subcooling created a frosty layer on the surface of the liquid.
meanings.sent5: I could sense the subcooling of the liquid as it reached a low temperature.
